DOC.brief_title: Use Of Three Commercial Preparations Of Injectable Hyaluronic Acid In Hands Rejuvenation
DOC.detailed_description: This single center , phase IV , randomize , investigator-blind study three different hyaluronic dermal filler injection volume enhance dorsum hand . As investigator-blind study , investigator unaware dermal filler inject dorsum hand .
DOC.criteria: Subjects agree take part procedure study ( include pretest , filler injection , photograph , etc . ) , fully inform objective nature investigation ; Written Informed Consent ; Treatmentnaive patient filler hand ; Subjects gender 18 year ; Fitzpatrick skin phototypes I VI ; Subjects present similar loss fatty tissue hand , least 2 accord Validated Hand Grading Scale2 ; Medical history physical examination , base investigator 's opinion , prevent patient take part study use product investigation ; Female subject childbearing age present negative urine pregnancy test use effective contraceptive method ; Availability subject throughout duration study ( 208 day ) ; Subjects sufficient school awareness enable cooperate degree require protocol . Pregnant woman woman intend become pregnant next 18 month ; Subjects know hypersensitivity hyaluronic acid product ; Subjects history adverse effect , sensitivity component formula , adverse effect , investigator 's opinion prevent patient participate study ; Subjects participate clinical trial ; Any prior surgery side effect hand area , prior cosmetic procedure , include permanent filler , may interfere result ; Subjects active inflammation infection area treat ; Subjects history medical treatment nonadherence show unwillingness adhere study protocol ; Subjects present disease coagulation disorder use anticoagulant , condition , opinion investigator , compromise evaluation study .
